alert.note: Alert for Newcastle; Northeastern Crook; Northern Campbell; Southern Campbell; Western Crook; Weston County Plains; Wyoming Black Hills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued January 14 at 1:58AM MST until January 15 at 11:00AM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST /NOON CST/ MONDAY... * WHAT...Dangerously cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 50 below zero. * WHERE...Portions of northwestern, south central, southwestern and the Black Hills of South Dakota and northeast and the Black Hills of Wyoming. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Cheyenne River Reservation, the Pine Ridge Reservation and the Rosebud Reservation. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST /noon CST/ Monday. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 5 minutes.
info.instruction: A Wind Chill Warning means the combination of wind and cold temperatures will create dangerously low wind chill values. Even if you are outdoors for just a few minutes, cover all parts of your body, especially your head, face, and hands.

area.areaDesc: Newcastle; Northeastern Crook; Northern Campbell; Southern Campbell; Western Crook; Weston County Plains; Wyoming Black Hills
